Name: VRChat OSC Channelpoints
Description: OSC Protokoll fÃ¼r VRChat in KaefiBOT

InteractiveKeys.Message: The 'twitch' in the Name field is the 'global' paramter. It has to be a 'global' parameter, so no VRCFury unless you set it there as 'global' in the Full-Controler sub-options! Learn more about that in the VRCFury official documentation. This example sets a value into an int-based parameter. You can do booleans with 1 or 0 for true or false e.g. on or off and also doubles by doing 1.0 or 0.333522 or 0.0005 s.o. in the value field!
